en.name: Jose Galiano
en.presentation: Dentist graduated from the National University of La Plata, specialist in Dentobuccal Prosthetics at the University of Buenos Aires (UBA), and specialist in Maxillofacial Surgery. Lecturer at Zygomatic Fullweek Argentina, Full Arch Argentina, and Zygoma Prime Napoli/Brazil. Currently practices in more than 6 locations across Argentina.
bio_items: Graduated from the Faculty of Dentistry of UNLP.
Lecturer at Zygomatic Fullweek Argentina, national and international courses.
en.zigomatic_desc_1: It is a pleasure to introduce the Zygomatic Implantology course, led by the distinguished expert in the field, Dr. Jos√© Galiano.
en.zigomatic_desc_2: In this course, participants will have the opportunity to acquire knowledge and practical skills in zygomatic implantology, one of the most innovative and effective techniques for restoring function and aesthetics in patients with maxillary bone loss.
en.zigomatic_desc_3: Dr. Galiano, with his extensive experience and international recognition, will share his knowledge and techniques to ensure that participants are equipped with the necessary tools to tackle complex cases and achieve optimal results.
fullarch_desc: Full Arch is an intensive and personalized training program designed for maxillofacial surgeons who want to master the Full Arch technique.
The course combines a theoretical workshop and a hands-on practical, allowing participants to develop skills using 3D models of real patients.
The faculty is made up of internationally renowned professionals:

Dr. Jos√© Galiano üá¶üá∑
Dr. Xiaowen Zhang üá∫üá∏
Dr. Augusto Druck üá¶üá∑
Dr. Kevin Kim üá∫üá∏
The course methodology is developed over 4 days, totaling 36 hours of theoretical and practical training, covering the latest techniques in oral rehabilitation.
The main topics covered in the program include:
fullarch_topics: Management of atrophic maxillae with zygomatic and pterygoid implants.
Implant rehabilitation techniques: All-on-6 and All-on-4.
Digital design in laboratory: use of Exocad and provisional makeup.
